title: The Secret Life Of Math: Discover How (And Why) Numbers Have Survived From the Cave Dwellers to Us! (A Williamson's Kids Can! Book)
features: Examines the evolution of mathematics, discussing its impact on the world and the vast changes that resulted from its constant development.
